title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Child Development Center
Interview Descriptions: It was a bit awkward at first. But then I felt more relaxed since the Manager made me feel comfortable at all times. So I can say that everything flowed comfortably and quickly.

title: Program Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Child Development Center
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, received a call about a week later. Asked to come in for an in person interview. You are with a group of other potential hires. You receive a sheet with some situational questions and wait until you are called back for your face to face interview with the hiring manager.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at the CDC?

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Child Development Center (San Jose, CA) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Awful disrespect of my time! Little clarity on expectations during the interview process. Repeatative questions during each phase! Lack of organization during final interview with other managers. During two phases managers were ten to fifteen minutes late. Panel interview required a "swot" analysis (seriously?) based on 4 school site visits over three days even though I knew nothing about the schools, leadership, or licenses.
Interview Questions: How would I mentor site supervisors?

title: Early Childhood Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Child Development Center
Interview Descriptions: It was a one on one interview with an array of questions to include point of view on children, experience.  Scenes were read out loud, then asked  how would you handle the situations?  How would you read a story?  to a infants?  to a preschoolers?
Interview Questions: Can you work the hours we put in front of you? As a flexible worker, personnel work whenever you are needed from 6am to 6pm.

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Child Development Center
Interview Descriptions: Just had a phone interview for a temporary position

title: Assistant Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Child Development Center (Irvine, CA) in Jul 2011
Interview Descriptions: It was short and easy, probably no more than 15 minutes. I already knew a couple of people that worked there so my interviewer told me they new my friends and I came highly recommended from them so my interview was just showing up and being nice.
Interview Questions: How do you interact with children and other type of questions similar to this such as how would you settle an argument or dispute between children.
